summary: Good Follower Mod, Follower with The Soldier. :D
descriptionHtml:
=========================================
Hezekiahsoft New 2 FollowerMod
=========================================
Version : 0.1-Beta
==========================================


============
Information
============
===================
I.Finding Follower
===================
1.Finding Barachiel
Barachiel can be found at dragonsreach, Whiterun
2.Finding Captain Hizkia
Captain Hizkia can be found at Blue Palace or CastleDour in Solitude.

=============================
II.The Follower Info
=============================
Barachiel have a very powerful Soldier and Barachiel have a very good skill.
Hizkia Have a very strong Soldier and Hizkia is Smart and difficult to kill
=============================
III.Report Bug
=============================
Report to My Mod Topic if you found the bug or send to my Email hezekiahsoftware@yahoo.com


SORRY!
My english is very bad. ^_^
author: HezekiahSoft - Newbie
